SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Lobby

Class LobbyUser

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Lobby.LobbyUser
All Implemented Interfaces:
LayerUser, Serializable
public class LobbyUser extends Object implements Serializable, LayerUser
This class represents a user within a lobby. It encapsulates information about the user's server-side identity, role within the lobby, connection status, and assigned lobby color.
See Also:

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object o)
      Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. Compares this LobbyUser instance with the specified object. Returns true if the given object is also a LobbyUser and both instances have the same serverUser.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      o - The object to compare with this LobbyUser.
      Returns:
      true if the objects are the same or have the same serverUser, false otherwise.

    • hashCode

      public int hashCode()
      Returns a hash code value for the LobbyUser object. The hash code is based on the serverUser of the LobbyUser.

    • toRecord

      protected LobbyUserRecord toRecord()
      Converts the current state of this LobbyUser into a data transfer object LobbyUserRecord. The record contains information about the user's username, role, color, and connection status.
      Returns:
      The LobbyUserRecord representing the current state of this LobbyUser.
